Warm-up

  • What are the main components of a computer system?

Q2:

int main() {
    int x = 1;
    int y = 2;
    x = x+5;
    printf("%d ", x);
    x = y*2;
    printf("%d ", x);
    x *= 5;
    printf("%d ", x);
    printf("%d ", x--);
    printf("%d ", x);
    printf("%d ", --x);
    printf("%d", x);
}

Q3:

int main() {
    int x = 5;
        int y = x/2;
        int z = x%2;
        printf("%d %d\n", y, z);
}

Q4:

int main() {
    int x = 5;
    char y = 'A';
    y = y + 5;
    printf("%c %d\n", y, y);
}
